results.title: Excellent Arrival Service At Chennai
results.description: I would like to place on record the excellent airport assistance provided by Murgency team at Chennai airport.My mother travelled alone from Dubai to Chennai on 8th Sept16 by Emirates flight.She was provided very good assistance on arrival at Chennai airport.I recommend Murgency for airport assistance services in India & abroad.

results.title: Possibly The Best Service
results.description: Better than i could have dreamed! Possibly the best service .. Were there on time, helped me throughtout the huge dubai airport, in all the visa processing.. I didn't need to do or worry for anything.. Thank you MUrgency Airport Assistance.

results.title: On Time Services
results.description: We used the services of this company for a meeting/wire at the Miami airport. Everything was great and in time:) Thank you very much)))

results.title: A Wonderful Setup
results.description: We would like to congratulate and thank team of MUrgency for helping so professionally our mother inlaw who was returning alone to Ahmedabad on Etihad airways. She is not proficient with air travels, has hearing problem and speaks only gujarati and hindi. Our worry was her transit stop at Abu Dhabi. How would she go through all that process of security, checking-in for departure, etc. MUrgency arranged a Hindi speaking Greeter at Abu Dhabi who was waiting to help her. Our mother inlaw has been very happy with the help she received by this Greeter in Abu Dhabi. And hats off to MUrgency team for updating us with information on what was going on with our mother inlaw by constantly mailing us all the way to the departure time, she even informed us on the flight delay! Many thanks to MUrgency and staff for such a wonderful setup.
results.shortDescription: Thank you to the MUrgency team for the professional help offered to our mother-in-law, who was traveling alone to Ahmedabad (India). She is not proficient with air travel, has a hearing problem and speaks Gujarati and Hindi. So, for her tansit at Abu Dhabi, MUrgency arranged a Hindi speaking greeter, which was much appreciated. Hats off to the MUrgency team for updating us along the way and informing us of the delayed flight.

results.title: The Service In Brussels Was Amazing
results.description: Alexandra picked me up from the plane door - drove me to a lounge where I waited while my passport was stamped and cleared customs and my bags were picked up. The lounge had food, showers and wifi and was a gorgeous space. She then walked me to the train station and helped me buy a ticket to my next destination. It was quick, painless and so easy and I would definitely recommend this service to anyone.
results.shortDescription: Alexandra picked me up from the plane door - drove me to a lounge where I waited while my passport was stamped and cleared customs and my bags were picked up. The lounge had food, showers and wifi and was a gorgeous space. She then walked me to the train station and helped me buy a ticket to my next destination. It was quick, painless and so easy and I would definitely recommend this service to anyone.

results.title: A Highly Recommended Service
results.description: I have used Murgency services twice now whilst on holidays in China May/June 2016. I chose them because I was travelling with my 82 year old father who could not walk very fast and I suspected the airports in China would be large, time consuming and daunting. I was right. Using these services was a life saver and a stress saver. At all times Murgency were efficient with communications and everything went smoothly from meeting at the airport door or tarmac, waiting in VIP lounges to assistance finding luggage and delivery to your hotel door. It worked just as well in reverse order navigating the huge airports, helping with language problems, finding the shortest possible queues. A highly recommended service.
results.shortDescription: I have used Murgency services twice. I was travelling with my 82 year old father and as I suspected the Chinese airports are large, time consuming and daunting. MUrgency's services were a life saver. They were efficient in communication, and everything went smoothly from the airport door or tarmac, access to the VIP lounge to assist with luggage and delivery to your hotel door. They helped with the language problem and quickly got done with the processes. A highly recommended service.

results.title: They Were So Genuinely Kind And Getting Through Customs Was A Breeze
results.description: Had a fabulous experience with MU Airport Assistance. I would highly recommend them to anyone wanting a professional full-service assistance. They were so genuinely kind and getting through customs was a breeze a very streamlined process.
results.shortDescription: Had a fabulous experience with MU Airport Assistance. I would highly recommend them to anyone wanting a professional full-service assistance. They were so genuinely kind and getting through customs was a breeze a very streamlined process.
